sentences.english: The chess professor confessed his professioning advishage in the confession.
sentences.chinese: 象棋教授在供狀中供認了其職業福氣。

sentences.english: In feminism he found an "amazonian" element.
sentences.chinese: 在女權主義，他找到了一位“亞馬孫”自供狀。

sentences.english: The chess instructor admitted his vocational congratulating in the confession.
sentences.chinese: 象碁教授在供狀中承認了其職業福氣。

sentences.english: The prisoner was forced to sign a confession against his will.
sentences.chinese: 犯人被迫在違反自己意願的供狀上籤了字。

sentences.english: The fingerprint was used as the written confession in prison after Tang.
sentences.chinese: 元代以後，指模才被用於獄詞供狀。

sentences.english: The chess instructor admitted his professional blessing in the confession.
sentences.chinese: 象碁教授在供狀中承認了其職業福氣。

sentences.english: Sheriff Bascue's files contain the killers' confessions.
sentences.chinese: 縣治安官巴斯克的檔案中也記錄了兇手的供狀。
